api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: get_meta_data
description: Get locale meta data of the specific site.

api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: search_locations
description: Search for related locations and suggestions.

query.desciption: Name of countries, cities, districts, places, etc...

siteId.desciption: The value of siteId field returned in get_meta_data function.

api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: list_properties
description: Query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world. This API reproduce PUBLIC data and features of related site/brand in real time and on demand.

dest_regionId.desciption: The value of gaiaId field returned in function search_locations.

check_in_date.desciption: The check-in date, format is [day, month, year].

check_out_date.desciption: The check-out date, format is [day, month, year].

num_adults_list.desciption: The list of number of adults in rooms.

children_ages_list.desciption: The list of number of children and their ages in rooms.

eapid.desciption: The value of EAPID field returned in get_meta_data function.

siteId.desciption: The value of siteId field returned in get_meta_data function.

resultSize.desciption: Number of items per response, for paging purpose. Default: 3.

resultStartingIndex.desciption: The offset of records to ignore, for paging purpose. Default: 0.

dest_coordinates.desciption: Specify GEO location of destination location, refer the value of coordinates field returned in search_locations function for best result. Format is [latitude, longitude].

sort.desciption: One of the following: PRICE_RELEVANT (default, Price + our picks) | REVIEW (Guest rating) | DISTANCE (Distance from downtown) | PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH (Price) | PROPERTY_CLASS (Star rating) | RECOMMENDED (Recommended)

hotelName.desciption: Filter by hotel name, refer the value of regionNames -> lastSearchName field returned in search_locations. "type" must be HOTEL.

price.desciption: Filter by price, format is [max, min].

accessibility.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: SIGN_LANGUAGE_INTERPRETER | STAIR_FREE_PATH | SERVICE_ANIMAL | IN_ROOM_ACCESSIBLE | ROLL_IN_SHOWER | ACCESSIBLE_BATHROOM | ELEVATOR | ACCESSIBLE_PARKING

travelerType.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: BUSINESS | FAMILY | LGBT.

mealPlan.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: FREE_BREAKFAST | HALF_BOARD | FULL_BOARD | ALL_INCLUSIVE.

poi.desciption: Filter for properties around a point of interest, format is lat,long:regionId. Refer dest_regionId section to get the correct value

regionId.desciption: Filter for properties with neighborhood. The value of neighborhoods -> regionId field returned right in this funtion.

lodging.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: VILLA | CONDO_RESORT | PENSION | TOWNHOUSE | AGRITOURISM | HOTEL_RESORT | HOLIDAY_PARK | CONDO

amenities.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: FREE_AIRPORT_TRANSPORTATION | OCEAN_VIEW | HOT_TUB | PETS | CASINO | SPA_ON_SITE | CRIB | BALCONY_OR_TERRACE | PARKING | ELECTRIC_CAR | RESTAURANT_IN_HOTEL | KITCHEN_KITCHENETTE | GYM | POOL | WASHER_DRYER | WATER_PARK | AIR_CONDITIONING | WIFI

star.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following : 10 (1-star hotel) | 20 (2-star hotel) | 30 (3-star hotel) | 40 (4-star hotel) | 50 (5-star hotel).

paymentType.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: FREE_CANCELLATION | PAY_LATER.

bedroomFilter.desciption: A list of which each element is one of the following: 0 (Studio) | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4.

api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

propertyId.desciption: The value of properties -> id field returned in list_properties, OR hotelId field returned in search_locations.

dest_regionId.desciption: The value of gaiaId field returned in function search_locations.

check_in_date.desciption: The check-in date, format is [day, month, year].

check_out_date.desciption: The check-out date, format is [day, month, year].

num_adults_list.desciption: The list of number of adults in rooms.

children_ages_list.desciption: The list of number of children and their ages in rooms.

eapid.desciption: The value of EAPID field returned in get_meta_data function.

siteId.desciption: The value of siteId field returned in get_meta_data function.

dest_coordinates.desciption: Specify GEO location of destination location, refer the value of coordinates field returned in search_locations function for best result. Format is [latitude, longitude].

api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: resolve_url
description: Hotels system is being merged with Expedia. This endpoint helps to convert the old hotel ID (embedded in the shared link, Ex : "ho133528" in hotels.com/ho133528/) to the new one (423818).

id.desciption: The id (started with ho…) extracted from the shared link. Ex: 'ho546370' from https://www.hoteles.com/ho546370.

siteId.desciption: The value of siteId field returned in get_meta_data function.

api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: get_reviews_summary
description: Get review summary score of a property.

propertyId.desciption: The value of properties -> id field returned in list_properties, OR hotelId field returned in search_locations.

eapid.desciption: The value of EAPID field returned in get_meta_data function.

siteId.desciption: The value of siteId field returned in get_meta_data function.

api_key.desciption: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
